content.value:
Media Luna Hostel has arrived to the capital and is now closer to the stars! Come and have the experience of a lifetime, where you will breathe magic in every spot you will be. Get to know the Colombian life style and share with people from around the globe an experience that will stay in your heart forever. You will have at your disposal all amenities needed: Free and super fast WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen waiting for your favourite recopies, a TV room to hang out, computers for your need, a pool table, also a ping-pong table to match your friends and more... Just walk out and find the park in front of our premises, where there is an open air gym and basketball field or make a pic nick with your fellow travellers.Also in order to discover the city, our team will provide you all you need regarding excursions, tours and cultural events in and around the city.

Located in the San Felipe neighbourhood, in Barrios Unidos, is projected as the new artistic district. This space, located between 72nd and 80th streets, between Avenida Caracas and Carrera 24, was born 100 years ago as a residential area, but over the years it became the trendiest zone in Bogota.

description.description: Media Luna Hostel Bogota in Bogot√° provides adults-only accommodation with a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Boasting a tour desk, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi.
